_sText:
Story:

Terrorists and counter-terrorists have met up for a
no-holds-barred, winner-take-all, sudden-death soccer match.
The first team to score a goal wins. Game-on!

Terrorists: Guard your goal and prevent the counter-terrorists
from scoring while trying put the ball in their goal.

Counter-terrorists: Guard your goal and prevent the terrorists
from scoring while trying put the ball in their goal.

Important information about the map:

* 32 total spawn points, 16 terrorist, 16 counter-terrorist
* As the match starts, get that ball moving with a 'nade or
  gunshot, otherwise the other team can easily line up a
  straight shot into your goal.

+ Special thanks to Benthos for all the help playtesting.
+ Thanks to everyone at Punkassfraggers.com, the best gaming
  community on the net.
+ Chevy van model by zareh.
